name: invincible-tech-systems/easeampmysql
description: A very simple and safe PHP library to execute SQL Queries as Prepared Statements on MySQL Database, in an asynchronous & non-blocking way. Methods are provided to prepare a SQL Statement & it's execution separately as different methods (to facilitate caching of prepared statements) as well as together in a single method too, all basing upon Amphp, an event driven concurrent framework in php and its Amphp\Mysql package.
